nodes.text: Imperial Star Destroyer was a painting available in the galaxy sometime after the Battle of Yavin during the Galactic Civil War, a conflict between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. It depicted an Imperial-class Star Destroyer patrolling a red planet.

The painting Imperial Star Destroyer, alongside the paintings KSE Firespray and X-Wing, was one of three bonus paintings that was unlockable as a result of players accessing Star Wars Galaxies after the "Double Everything Weekend" event on the last days of The Empire Strike's Back 30th Anniversary Celebration. Accessing Galaxies after the Double Everything Weekend resulted in a painting container that contained, at random, one of these three paintings.
